items.sentence: Tom isn't as motivated to do that as Mary is.
Tom isn't as desperate to do that as Mary is.
Tom is interested in learning how to do that.
Tom has been doing that for over three years.
Tom and I weren't the only ones who did that.
Tom and I weren't really supposed to do that.
There's no way Tom is going to do that today.
It's clear that Tom was the one who did that.
It looked like Tom really enjoyed doing that.
I'm going to be angry if Tom doesn't do that.
